attributes.action: Convene a fresh Brexit referendum in the light of a damaging no-deal and Covid
attributes.additional_details: Because the basis upon which a substantial proportion of leave voters opted for that choice now bears no recognition to the proposition which is on the table and the economic context has also been transformed to a far more challenging environment to undertake the downside of a no-deal Brexit
attributes.background: Reopen the debate on the merits of Brexit in view of the massive disparity between the opportunities and benefits expected and the no deal terms with which we are now confronted. Also taking account of the economic shock caused by Covid which the no-deal Brexit will compound
